resources.string: is greater than the number chosen by program
is less than the number chosen by program
Sorry, game over, your time is exhausted

The object of the game is to guess the hidden four digit number. There are no repeated digits in the number. Once you have guessed, a code will be shown that indicates how successful your guess was.\n Character A : correct digit in the right place. \n Character B : correct digit in the wrong place.
